value.stringValue: {"mentions":[],"message":"Hi there, please check if the form respondent is an authorised party before proceeding with the case, then ensure that the once you have please access the campaign and change status of respective campaign member's school to Interested. Now you can assign to Tier 2 Support Engineering."}

Hi there, please check if the form respondent is an authorised party before proceeding with the case, then ensure that the once you have please access the campaign and change status of respective campaign member's school to Interested. Now you can assign to Tier 2 Support Engineering.
{"mentions":[],"message":"Hi there, this school {![Case].Account.Account_Friendly_Name__c} has responded to the opt-in form for DNS Filtering. Please update the campaign status accordingly. TIA"}

{"mentions":[],"message":"Hi there, please check the following:
• which account this request relates to
• if the form respondent is an authorised party before proceeding with the case
once you have please assign to Tier 2 Support Engineering"}

{"mentions":[],"message":"Hi there, this case has been created {![Case].CaseNumber}although the account could not be identified. HD has been informed to follow up and identify the account. TIA"}

{"mentions":[],"message":"Hi there, this school {![Case].Account.Account_Friendly_Name__c} has had the DNS filtering service implemented and the case is now closed. Please update the campaign status accordingly. TIA"}
